data_table.description: Smoking and Alcohol Use Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Smoking and Alcohol Use Form]

variable.name: ALC1
variable.description: Q1. Smoking. Smoke cigarettes [Smoking and Alcohol Use Form]

variable.name: ALC2
variable.description: Q2. Alcohol. Ever consumed alcoholic beverages [Smoking and Alcohol Use Form]

variable.name: ALC3
variable.description: Q3. Alcohol. Presently drink alcoholic beverages [Smoking and Alcohol Use Form]

variable.name: ALC4
variable.description: Q4. Alcohol. Number of years since stopped drinking [Smoking and Alcohol Use Form]

variable.name: ALC5
variable.description: Q4. Alcohol. Number of 4 Oz glasses of wine per week [Smoking and Alcohol Use Form]

variable.name: ALC5A
variable.description: Q5a. Alcohol. Days per week drinking wine [Smoking and Alcohol Use Form]

variable.name: ALC6
variable.description: Q6. Alcohol. Number Of 12 Oz beers per week [Smoking and Alcohol Use Form]

variable.name: ALC6A
variable.description: Q6a. Alcohol. Days per week drinking beer [Smoking and Alcohol Use Form]

variable.name: ALC7
variable.description: Q7. Alcohol. Number of hard liquor drinks per week [Smoking and Alcohol Use Form]

variable.name: ALC7A
variable.description: Q7a. Alcohol. Days per week drinking hard liquor [Smoking and Alcohol Use Form]

variable.name: ALC8
variable.description: Q8. Alcohol. Number of drinks in past 24 hours [Smoking and Alcohol Use Form]

variable.name: ALC0AY
variable.description: Year of completion date [Smoking and Alcohol Use Form]
